comment.body:
Hi ! I'm catholic and want to say something: christians always want to help other people (refugees ans so on..).
But have a look at it: other communities are so better, between them. I speak about :jews, muslims, asians. In france, these communities have a plenty of shops because all the persons inside a community give money to help others. 
muslims: cabs, restaurants (kebab)
jews: clothes and shoes shops, banks, bakeries
chinese: asian restaurants
